title: Easy Discord Dev Badge
steps: Make sure you run the file local_server.exe. Otherwise, the bot will not work.
Go to Discord Developer Portal and create new application.
Add new bot in the Bot section.
Reset Token and copy it. Donâ€™t share it with anyone!
Paste your token on this page and press the button.
Create a server and enable Community.
Use the invite link to invite the bot.
